A simple, clean design NewTab Extension, with calming colors, nature-inspired backgrounds, and a focus on mindfulness to help users feel relaxed and focused while browsing.

By clicking “Add to Chrome”, I accept and agree to install this new tab extension and its search settings, Terms of Use, and Privacy Policy.

The search features within the extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing.
